fullText:
谷歌刚刚放出了设备端模型：Gemma 3n，原生支持多模态，2GB RAM即可运行

其中E4B版本LMArena得分超过1300，是首个10B以下达到此基准的模型

支持设备端函数调用，文本图像交错处理，能理解音视频输入

支持140种文本语言和35种语言的多模态理解，并在数学、编程以及推理方面有提升 https://t.co/etLM7aZbZP

fullText:
酷，Google Labs刚刚放出了款手机虚拟试穿应用：Doppl，可用照片、屏幕截图试穿，看起来很丝滑

它还可以生成试穿效果视频，展示衣服的动态效果，让用户真实感受“上身”效果

上传照片，Doppl会生成一个数字化的动画版本的用户形象，然后用衣服照片或截图即可“试穿”

Doppl基于Google https://t.co/fWoAHohmmn

user.name: Garry Tan
user.description: President & CEO @ycombinator —Founder @Initialized—designer/engineer who helps founders—San Francisco Dem accelerating the boom loop—e/acc—technology brother

fullText:
When presenting your startup to anyone anytime

1/ What is it?
2/ What problem does it solve and for who?
3/ Why is this the best?

All the commentary in the world about your space, your monetization strategy, your tech stack, your brand is nothing without nailing those first 3
